overview: Director: Mauro Gia Samonte  Writer: Mauro Gia Samonte (story and screenplay)  Stars: Rene Requiestas, Jackie Forster, Shirley Fuentes, Sunshine Cruz, Karla Estrada, Ricardo Cepeda  Jean Saburit, Benjo Leelin, Jeffrey Santos, Aljon Jimenez, Wowie Cruz, Romano Vasquez  Jomar Cruz, Monica Herrera, Vangie Labalan
title: First Time… Like A Virgin!
